atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL OUTER REAR VIEW MIRROR ASSEMBLY LH

s3.ptxt: Install the mirror so that the claw attaches, and install the 2 nuts.
Install the mirror so that the claw attaches, and install the 3 nuts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT NO. 2 SPEAKER ASSEMBLY (w/ Front No. 2 Speaker)

s2.ptxt: Install the front No. 2 speaker assembly with the nut.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR TRIM BOARD SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 9 clips to install the front door trim board.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR LOWER FRAME BRACKET GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips to install the front door lower frame bracket garnish.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL POWER WINDOW REGULATOR MASTER SWITCH ASSEMBLY WITH FRONT UPPER ARMREST BASE PANEL LH (w/ Power Window, for Driver Side)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 8 claws and 2 clips to install the power window regulator master switch assembly with front door armrest base panel.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL POWER WINDOW REGULATOR SWITCH ASSEMBLY WITH FRONT UPPER ARMREST BASE PANEL RH (w/ Power Window, for Front Passenger Side)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 clips and 8 claws to install the power window regulator switch assembly with front upper armrest base panel RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT UPPER ARMREST BASE PANEL LH (w/o Power Window)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 8 claws and 2 clips to install the front upper armrest base panel.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR HANDLE ASSEMBLY (w/o Power Window)

s2.ptxt: Temporarily install the front door window regulator handle, fully close the window, and then remove the front door window regulator handle.
Install the plate and snap ring to the front door window regulator handle.
